description: Use Background for repeated Given steps across 3+ scenarios. Background contains only Given/And steps (no When/Then). Example: Background: Given user is logged in And character sheet exists (used by 5 scenarios).

do.description: Background for shared context across multiple scenarios. Example: Given user is logged in (common to all), not scenario-specific setup

guidance.description: Use Background when 3+ scenarios share same Given steps
example: Background: Given user is logged in And character sheet exists (used by 5 scenarios)

guidance.description: Background contains only Given/And - state setup, no actions
example: Background: Given Agent is initialized with agent_name='story_bot' And Project is finished initializing

dont.description: Don't use Background for unique setup or include When/Then. Example: Background with action verbs (wrong), Background for 1 scenario (wrong)

guidance.description: Don't include actions or When/Then in Background
example: Background: Given user logs in (WRONG - action)
Background: When user clicks button (WRONG - When in Background)

guidance.description: Don't put scenario-specific setup in Background
example: Background: Given test project at path/to/specific/test (WRONG - scenario-specific)
